Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.iterators

Class CyclicalIterator<E>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.iterators.CyclicalIterator<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<E>
public class CyclicalIterator<E> extends Object implements Iterator<E>
This class provides an iterator for a List of abstract elements E. This implementation iterates through the list from a startIndex, performing a cyclical and clock-wise scan.
